text: Mishar, or Mior Shariman Hassan, was a Malaysian cartoonist whose career started in the 1960s. He worked as an illustrator and writer at the Institute of Language and Literature. Also he worked with the Utusan Melayu newspaper. ==See also== * Gila-Gila ==References== Category:Malaysian cartoonists Category:Malaysian comics artists Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Mishar (cartoonist)
